name: @jbwittner/blizzardswagger_wow-retail-api_typescript-axios
description: The axios client for WoW Companion application

scripts.postgenerate: rimraf git_push.sh && rimraf .openapi-generator-ignore && rimraf .gitignore && rimraf .openapi-generator && rimraf openapitools.json
scripts.delete: npm run clean && rimraf *.ts && rimraf api && rimraf model && rimraf .npmignore
scripts.all: npm ci && npm run delete && npm run generate && npm run build

author: WITTNER Jean-Baptiste
